text: **FIGURE 1** | Schematic overview of the sampling site and sampling locations. Soil samples (surface soil, -1, -1.5, and -2 m) and samples of root and rhizosphere of grass were taken in an area of one meter around OW149-4 and OW175-4 (n = 4). Root and rhizosphere samples of poplar were taken of the trees growing closest to the two observation wells, with four repetitions for each tree.
